summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3997 for the improvement of North 35th Street, from Aurora Avenue to Stone Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 48597, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
